sentences.en: At some higher velocity individual grains will roll and slide intermittently along the bed.
sentences.cn: 在稍高一些的流速时,个别的颗粒沿着河床间歇地滚动和滑动.

sentences.en: But random ports seem to be shutting down intermittently.
sentences.cn: 但某些随机端口却似乎间歇性地在关闭.

sentences.en: Does the impairment of your hearing occur constantly or intermittently?
sentences.cn: 您的听力减退是持续性的还是间歇性的?

sentences.en: Electronically - controlled injection systems use electro - magnetic injectors to inject the fuel intermittently.
sentences.cn: 电子控制燃油喷射系统采用电磁式喷油器断续地喷射燃油.

sentences.en: I kept the boys in sight intermittently all the way.
sentences.cn: 一路上我时不时地看着孩子们.

sentences.en: If stations are only intermittently visible it may be the only practicable system.
sentences.cn: 若有一些方向只能断斯续续地通视,这可能是唯一实用的方法.

sentences.en: It is better for a dry battery to be used intermittently.
Pockets of thick fog get trapped along the ridgelines, magpies nest among the outcrops, and springs intermittently spray over the rocks.
sentences.cn: 厚重的浓雾弥漫于山脊线，露头的岩层上还垒着喜鹊窝，间歇的山泉水喷洒在岩石之上。

sentences.en: Seams in the anorthosite series are only intermittently exposed.
sentences.cn: 斜长岩组中的矿层仅断续出露.

sentences.en: Still another system is designed to send out transient pulses intermittently.
sentences.cn: 还设计了另一种系统,它能够间歇地发送瞬间脉冲.

sentences.en: The bathroom drains emits foul odor intermittently at night.
sentences.cn: 浴室的排水渠在夜间排放恶臭的气味.

sentences.en: The fault occurs intermittently and only in rare cases.
sentences.cn: 故障间断地和仅仅在极少例子中出现.

sentences.en: The foaming line of surf stretched port and starboard, broken intermittently.
sentences.cn: 船的左右舷处都涌动着海浪泛起的泡沫.

sentences.en: The orchards and forests run intermittently for nearly 200 km.
sentences.cn: 果园和森林交叉着延伸近200公里.

sentences.en: The resin moves intermittently down and out of the bed.
sentences.cn: 树脂周期地向下移动和移出床层.

sentences.en: This has significant cost savings over purchasing and maintaining the hardware for jobs run intermittently.
sentences.cn: 对于间歇运行的作业，这可以极大地节省购买和维护硬件的成本。

sentences.en: We can distinguish two types of global climates which occurred intermittently in the past.
sentences.cn: 我们可以把全球性的气候分成两种类型,过去这两种气候轮替出现.

words.tran_cn: 时断时续，间歇性；周期性
间歇性；间歇现象；间歇度
间歇抽油装置；间歇调节器
